rooms.description: A welcoming space with a reception desk, seating area, and natural light from large windows. Features Bohemian decor including artistic wall finishes and eclectic furniture.

A seamless transition between kitchen and living space, designed for a family of four. Incorporates high-quality materials, modern yet Bohemian-inspired finishes, with an emphasis on natural light and ventilation.
Spacious master suite featuring a king-size bed, walk-in closet, and an en-suite bathroom. Decor includes vibrant colors and natural textures in accordance with Bohemian aesthetics.
A comfortable guest bedroom, designed for occasional use by family members or visitors. Incorporates bohemian elements such as patterned textiles and artisanal decor.
A quiet study area designed for work or relaxation, featuring comfortable seating, ample lighting, and storage solutions. Bohemian accents are present through eclectic decor choices.
A private space for domestic help with necessary facilities, ensuring privacy and convenience while adhering to local building norms.

openings.description: A large arched entrance door designed for both aesthetic appeal and functional access.
Large windows and strategically placed skylights to maximize natural light in keeping with Vastu principles.
A dedicated opening leading to an outdoor swimming pool area designed for relaxation and family gatherings.

rooms.description: A vast open living space that integrates the kitchen, dining, and relaxation area. Emphasizes Bohemian design with artistic lighting, mixed textures, and vibrant patterns.
An open-air balcony offering panoramic views of the surroundings. Designed for relaxation and occasional outdoor dining, adhering to local building norms and Vastu principles.

A door leading from the penthouse studio to the balcony/terrace for easy access.
